Texts.Chs: 一颗奇特的^orange;恐龙蛋^reset;？！哇！但是我们可以用它来做什么呢？
Texts.Eng: A freakin' ^orange;DINOSAUR EGG^reset;?!??! Wow! What can we do with it, I wonder?

Texts.Chs: 作为一种天然的酒精，^orange;甲醇^reset;有多种实验用途。获得它的最简单方法就是简单的把^cyan;木料^reset;放入^orange;萃取设备^reset;中。
Texts.Eng: A natural alcohol, ^orange;Methanol^reset; can be used in a variety of ways in your lab. The easiest way to obtain it is through simply placing some ^cyan;Wood^reset; in an ^orange;Extractor^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 组织培养物是在涉及到遗传学中必不可少的实验材料，它会帮助你开拓全新的遗传学领域！
Texts.Eng: Absolutely essential in lab work involving genetics, tissue cultures open the gate to whole new areas of experimentation.

Texts.Chs: 好吧……我觉得你不应该碰从那个可怕生物身上掉下来的肉。不过，我觉得应该会派上用场的。
Texts.Eng: Allright...you probably shouldn't have touched this stuff. Flesh from that hideous beast. Ew. But I am positive it will be useful.

Texts.Chs: 惊人，这似乎是一块残缺的先驱无人机控制芯片。我会将其发送回飞船并下载星际标准语言到它的数据库，您返回的时候就可以将它重新启动了。
Texts.Eng: Amazing. This seems to be the control chip for a defective Precursor drone. I'll beam it back to the ship and download Galactic Standard Tongue to its databanks. It'll be ready to reboot by the time you return.

Texts.Chs: 这是一颗不寻常的^orange;奇异结核^reset;，其以混有有机和无机标记的异常特征发出脉冲。它可能能在实验室环境中提供一些实用的功效。
Texts.Eng: An unusual ^orange;Strange Nodule^reset; that pulses with an unnusual signature, it bears both organic and inorganic markers. It might provide some useful function in a laboratory setting.

Texts.Chs: 矿物原料可以从大多数石头中通过萃取获得。请尽可能地储存多一些。
Texts.Eng: Another staple ingredient in the lab, raw minerals can be easily obtained from most types of stone via extraction. Stockpile as much as possible.

Texts.Chs: 收割大量的^orange;藻豆荚^reset;对生物燃料和有机研究有直接好处。这些绿色物质让旅行大为不同。为了制造生物燃料，你需要先研究^orange;化学^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Biofuel and organic research are two direct benefits to harvesting large amounts of ^orange;Algae^reset;. It can make all the difference in travel. To create Bio-Fuel you'll need to research ^orange;Chemistry^reset; first.

Texts.Chs: 当涉及到高端技术时，电路板是必需的。它可以制造出令人叹服的科学设备。研究^orange;工程学^reset;以显示更多。
Texts.Eng: Circuitboards are essential when it comes to higher-end tech. Higher-end boards produce amazing machines. Research into ^orange;Engineering^reset; might reveal more.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;备用零件^reset;或许是你多余的收集物中的其中一种，不过你是不是可以尝试把钨提炼出来？快来试试吧！
Texts.Eng: Miscellaneous pieces of metal, ^orange;Spare Parts^reset; may seem odd to collect until you consider the tungsten they can be extracted for. Try it. You'll see!

Texts.Chs: 飞螳丝可以织成用以实验应用的^orange;生物纤维^reset;，我相信你会认可它的用途。
Texts.Eng: Mutavisk silk woven into a ^orange;Bio Thread^reset;, ready for application in the lab. I think you'll be pleased with what it can do for you.

Texts.Chs: 营养糊由食物萃取的糊状物。它是实验室的主要原料，你会需要大量这种物质。
Texts.Eng: Raw, untarnished paste created from small samples of material. This is a staple in every lab, and you'll go through a ton of it.

Texts.Chs: 令人又爱又恨，^orange;泡荚^reset;像精制前的排泄物一样臭。 但是，其精炼后有很多用途。
Texts.Eng: Repulsive and goopy, ^orange;Blister Sack^reset; stinks like excrement before refinement. When refined, however, it has many uses.

Texts.Chs: 树脂是一种坚硬的物质，主要用于制作保护性护甲。
Texts.Eng: Resin is a hard substance that has applications primarily in protective gear.

Texts.Chs: 绿色黏液看上去没什么用，实际上你可以在做出很多有趣的玩意儿。例如，一件由黏液制成的护甲？通过正确地研究^orange;盔甲和武器^reset;，你可以将之变成现实。
Texts.Eng: Slimey goop may not seem useful, until you actually use some in a lab. Imagine, armor made of slime? You can make it a reality with the right Research into ^orange;Armor and Weapons^reset;.

Texts.Chs: 矿物样品是实验中不可或缺的材料。没有它，你将无法种植出高等植物。
Texts.Eng: Strictly for lab use, mineral samples none the less prove to be essential. Without them you'll be unable to produce advanced plant life.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;飞螳丝^reset;有着超强韧性，超高的可塑性以及可以抵抗所有辐射。看来你已经明白这种材料如果运用到护甲上是多么完美了吧！
Texts.Eng: Super tough, super malleable and utterly resistant to radiation of almost all sorts, this ^orange;Mutavisk Silk^reset; can be made into great clothing and armor.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;镁粉^reset;既可以用于制作先进基因，又可以活化极其稳定的粒子物质。
Texts.Eng: Take this ^orange;Magnesium Powder^reset; and use it to create advanced genes, or to help destabilize otherwise completely stable particles.

Texts.Chs: 这些被称作^orange;升级模块^reset;的小盒子非常有用。它们允许你通过你的^orange;个人三度仪^reset;升级你的武器和盔甲，如果你使用^yellow;原版飞船^reset;选项，也能用来升级你的飞船执照。
Texts.Eng: These little boxes, known as ^orange;Upgrade Modules^reset;, are extremely useful. They will allow you to upgrade your weapons and armor via your ^orange;Personal Tricorder^reset; as well as upgrade your ship license if using the ^yellow;Vanilla Ship^reset; option.

Texts.Chs: 这件古代遗物看起来极有价值！你可以卖掉它以获取大量像素……或许你还会发现其他的用途。在^orange;显微镜^reset;下研究以显示更多信息。
Texts.Eng: This ancient relic looks quite valuable! You could sell it for exorbitant amounts of pixels...or perhaps you'll find other uses. A ^orange;Microscope^reset; might reveal more information.

Texts.Chs: 遗传物质是你研究基因工程最关键的材料！
Texts.Eng: This sample of genetic material will prove to be an absolute necessity in your laboratory.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;真菌脓液^reset;这种奇怪材料本质上就是由真菌构成的，它可以黏在任何有机物上。
Texts.Eng: This strange substance ^orange;Fungal Ichor^reset; is fungal in nature, with a sort of sticky property that adheres to any organic matter.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;暗影气体^reset;会发出着强烈的恶臭，除了会减慢你的移动速度之外，还可能给你造成心理与免疫系统造成长期的损伤。
Texts.Eng: This vile ^orange;Caliginous Gas^reset; really screws up your movement ability within it due to neurological effects that permeate even specially treated membranes, and can cause long-term damage to the psyche and immune system.

Texts.Chs: 科技卡用于创造更好的科技，如果你需要跳的更高，冲刺得更远，或者变成微小的小球以穿过孔洞时，它将会非常有用。
Texts.Eng: Used in the creation of better tech, ^orange;Tech Cards^reset; are valuable finds that you should save for when you need to jump higher or dash farther or tuck into tiny little spheres to get through holes.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;硫酸镁^reset;主要用于医疗和农学实践。它还是一种非常有用的静脉药物添加剂，也是肥料的重要材料。
Texts.Eng: Used primarily in medical and agricultural practices, ^orange;Magnesium Sulfate^reset; makes for a very handy additive in some intravenous drugs, or soil enrichment from fertilizers.

Texts.Chs: 谁不喜欢^orange;氧气^reset;呢？对吧，呼吸是最重要的事！但氧气除了可以用于呼吸之外还有更多用处。快去你的实验室里看看吧。
Texts.Eng: Who doesn't love ^orange;Oxygen^reset;, am I right? Breathing is great! But oxygen has many other uses. Poke around in your lab and see.
With ^orange;Iodine^reset; available, advanced medicine and methyl iodide become relatively simple to produce. I'd collect as much as you can.

Texts.Chs: 有了^orange;皮革^reset;，你可以做出一些超棒的护甲保护你。研究^orange;工艺学^reset;以显示更多。
Texts.Eng: With ^orange;Leather^reset;, you can fashion some wonderful protection from harm or the elements. Researching ^orange;Craftsmanship^reset; should reveal more.

Texts.Chs: 在不使用^orange;肥料^reset;的情况下，作物长至成熟需要花费更多时间，请记得一定要使用它，尤其是你有了^orange;作物托盘^reset;之后！
Texts.Eng: Without ^orange;fertilizer^reset;, you'll have a tougher time making and growing plants. It is especially useful in ^orange;Hydroponic Trays^reset;!

Texts.Chs: 你不能在这里使用船员合同。
Texts.Eng: You cannot use that crew contract here.

Texts.Chs: 你的研究会需要到大量的^orange;硫酸铵^reset;，没有它，你将无法生产出更高品质的肥料！研究^orange;化学^reset;以显示更多。
Texts.Eng: You'll need a fair amount of ^orange;Ammonium Sulfate^reset; in your lab work. Without it you'll be unable to produce high quality fertilizers! Research into ^orange;Chemistry^reset; will reveal more.

Texts.Chs: 看来你发现了一些^orange;骨头^reset;。虽然它有些粗糙和原始，但它却可以制造出各种有用的物质，例如武器和护甲。在研究^orange;盔甲和武器^reset;之后，进入你的^green;[C]制作栏^reset;，选择武器栏来制作它们。
Texts.Eng: You've found some ^orange;Bone^reset;. While somewhat grisly and primitive it can still produce various useful goods including weapons and armor. Access your ^green;[C]rafting^reset; menu and select the Weapons tab to make them after researching into the ^orange;Armor and Weapons^reset; tree.

Texts.Chs: 感谢^cyan;高级塑料^reset;，你已经开启了一个全新的研究分支。据说蕨树对于创建大量的塑料非常有帮助。研究^orange;农业学^reset;以显示更多。
Texts.Eng: You've opened up a whole new branch of research thanks to ^cyan;Advanced Plastic^reset;. They say that Bracken trees can greatly help to create plenty of plastic. Research into ^orange;Agriculture^reset; might reveal more.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;竹子^reset; 在你的科学实验中并没有什么用处，不过它或许可以建个漂亮的林中小屋！
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Bamboo^reset; will have little use in your lab, but it might just help you build a fancy jungle hut!

Texts.Chs: ^orange;生化孢子^reset;有着发出生物荧光的能力，可以制作出许多方便实用的东西。快去试试吧！
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Bioluminescent Spores^reset; can glow in the dark, surely they will be useful for your laboratory creations. Check it out!

Texts.Chs: ^orange;硝酸钙^reset;是农药和化肥中的另一种必不可少的成分，如果您打算建设一处有利可图的农场，你肯定需要一些。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Calcium Nitrate^reset; is an essential element in pesticides and fertilizers. You'll need some of this stuff if you plan to have a profitable farm.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;粘合剂^reset;是实验室中的奇迹。据称它可以在亚原子水平上束缚某些元素，从而创造出全新的物理学形式。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Corvex^reset; is a laboratory miracle. It can allegedly bind certain elements at a sub-atomic level and create entirely new sorts of physics as a result.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;内胚层体型胶状物^reset;相当诡异，但却很容易被塑形。这意味着由它所制成的各种道具都是非常奇怪的。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Endomorphic Jelly^reset; is a bizarre stuff. It can be shaped very specifically with relative ease. This means weapons, armor and equipment of a most odd sort.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;氦-3^reset;既是燃料又是能源。当在大气层中时，它会呈现一种不寻常的效果，会让你的探索更为有趣。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Helium-3^reset; is both a fuel and energy source. It also creates an unusual effect when in large clouds, leading to hilarity in exploration.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;氢气^reset;有着多方面的应用，但是你会发现它最适合于^orange;化学^reset;和^orange;农业学^reset;。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Hydrogen^reset; gas can be applied in a variety of ways, though you'll find it best suited for ^orange;Chemistry^reset; and ^orange;Agriculture^reset;.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;心印石^reset;是一种经提取后为实验提供直接好处的矿物。一种精细的晶体，只要正确应用就能事半功倍。你所需要做的就是把它放入你的^orange;物质萃取器^reset;，然后随它去吧！
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Koanite^reset; is another extractable ore that provides direct benefits to your lab work. A fine crystal, it can be useful with the proper application. Place in your ^orange;Extractor^reset; and off you go!

Texts.Chs: ^orange;甲基碘^reset;只有一种用途：制作杀虫剂。它可以帮助作物托盘里的作物好好成长！
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Methyl Iodide^reset; has but one use, and that is in the creation of pesticides. These help with hydroponics trays, producing more valuable resources.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;激光挖掘器^reset;是是非常有用的物质枪替代品。它们可以单手持有，而且可以在^orange;三度仪^reset;处升级至多20次。你可以在你的加工台制造一个。它们非常强力，值得为你所用。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Mining lasers^reset; are a useful alternative to a Manipulator. They can function one-handed, and can be upgraded up to 20 times through your ^orange;Tricorder^reset;. It's worth it. They get quite powerful.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;氮气reset;存在于任何地方，当然了，如果你没有找错地方的话。我想在研究中你会需要到大量氮气的。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Nitrogen^reset; can be found in abundance all over the place if you know where to look. You'll want a fair amount of it in your research.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;杀虫剂^reset;对于农民特别有用，它提供了一种简单有效的害虫防治方法。研究^orange;化学^reset;以显示更多。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Pesticide^reset; is exceptionally useful for farmers, providing a simple and effective method for pest control. Research into ^orange;Chemistry^reset; will reveal more.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;腐泥^reset;非常稀有，另外它也非常粘稠。不过通过研究^orange;化学^reset;，你会发现它有着相当有趣的用途。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Putrid Slime^reset; is really quite gross. You'll find it has a few rather interesting uses through research into ^orange;Chemistry^reset;.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;机甲修复枪^reset;允许你在领域范围内修复你的机甲。它们可以在^orange;工具升级站^reset;升级至多20次。你可以在你的加工台制造一个。它们非常强力，值得为你所用。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Repair Guns^reset; allow you to repair your Mech in the field. They can be upgraded up to 20 times in a ^orange;Tool Upgrade Table^reset; once you build one. You'll find one in your Machining Table. It's worth it. They get quite powerful.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;盐^reset;是一种普遍存在的物质，尤其在水中。它适用于绝大多数科学研究。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Salt^reset; is quite abundant (especially in water) and applied as a resource in numerous scientific branches.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;硅^reset;有着广泛的应用，我们主要将其用于制造微型芯片的设备。研究^orange;电子学^reset;和^orange;工程学^reset;以显示更多。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Silicon^reset; has a range of uses, though for our purposes it will be used for technological devices such as microchips. Research into ^orange;Electronics^reset; and ^orange;Engineering^reset; will reveal more.

Texts.Chs: ^orange;丝绸^reset;是一种高品质的纺织品，有着许多广泛的应用，包括^orange;化学^reset;中使用高级知识的高端塑料。
Texts.Eng: ^orange;Silk^reset; is a high quality textile that has many useful applications, including high-end plastics using advanced knowledge in ^orange;Chemistry^reset;.
